com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner

Class RowScannerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner.RowScannerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RowScanner

    public class RowScannerProxy
extends Object
implements RowScanner
    Client for scanning over a selection of rows.

    To obtain an instance of a RowScanner, call HBaseClient.scan(byte[]).

    This implementation is a proxy for a Scanner.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RowScannerProxy(Scanner scanner)
      Creates a new RowScannerProxy for the given Scanner.
